thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Guangdong Shenglu Telecommunication Tech amends FY 2017 net profit outlook

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Guangdong Shenglu Telecommunication Tech amends FY 2017 net profit outlook

organizations.name: guangdong shenglu telecommunication tech co ltd

text:
Jan 31(Reuters) - Guangdong Shenglu Telecommunication Tech Co Ltd :
* Says net profit for FY 2017 to be 100 million yuan to 130 million yuan
* Says in the previous outlook, the company expected the net profit for FY 2017 to be 160 million yuan to 180 million yuan
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was was 161.4 million yuan
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/38JD2C
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
